add_to_active_order_confirmation: Are you sure you want to add this to your active order?
location_access_explanation: We use your location to provide accurate address suggestions and improve your delivery experience. You can still use the app by manually selecting your location on the map.
location_denied_manual_select: Location access was denied. No problem! You can still use the app by manually selecting your delivery location on the map.
location_permanently_denied_message: Location access has been permanently denied. To enable location services, you can go to Settings and allow location access for this app. Alternatively, you can manually select your location on the map.
login_or_create_account: Log in or create a UstaHub account
onboarding_desc_1: Browse and discover skilled professionals for all your home service needs
onboarding_desc_2: Get instant price estimates and book your service in just a few taps
onboarding_desc_3: Stay updated with real-time tracking and manage your bookings easily

essential_services_title: Essential services delivered instantly to you.
essential_services_subtitle: All the services you need, delivered fast and easy â€” right from your phone, anytime, anywhere, with just a few taps.
connect_with_verified_experts: Connect with verified experts for all your home service needs. Quality work, guaranteed satisfaction.
schedule_appointments_conveniently: Schedule appointments at your convenience. Fast, simple, and hassle-free booking.
satisfaction_assured_every_time: Every service comes with our satisfaction guarantee. Your peace of mind is our priority.
location_disabled_desc: Please enable location on your device to determine your address.
permission_denied_desc: The app does not have permission to use location. Please grant permission in settings.
booking_success_msg: Your order has been successfully received. Our specialists will contact you shortly.
active_orders_description: You don't have any active service orders at the moment.
closed_orders_description: You don't have any completed or canceled service orders yet.
are_you_sure_logout: Are you sure you want to logout from your account?
search_hint: Search for your favorite thing or find similar results in this area.
service_confirmed_msg: Your order for the '{service}' service has been accepted by the master.
about_content: UstaHub is your reliable partner for finding the best local masters for any task. Our mission is to simplify the process of booking professional home services while ensuring quality and reliability.
terms_content: By using UstaHub, you agree to follow our service guidelines. We provide a platform connecting users with masters. All transactions must be carried out through the application to ensure security.
privacy_content: Your privacy is important to us. We collect only necessary data to provide our services and do not share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent.
work_with_us_content: Are you a professional master looking for more clients? Join UstaHub and start growing your business today. We provide the platform, you provide the expertise.
